informationretrieval

Class AdHocDocumentRetrieval

  • java.lang.Object
    • informationretrieval.AdHocDocumentRetrieval

  • public class AdHocDocumentRetrieval
extends java.lang.Object
    Scenarios available : mlt1 : for each user of the test set, retrieve the 20 first matching documents compared to the user totalProduction. Executed against eriskMoreLikeThis core. mlt2 : for each user of the test set, retrieve the 20 first matching documents compared to the user totalProduction. Executed against eriskRun2 core.
